verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> which came to <S%H6846>Zephaniah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3570>Cushi,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1436>Gedaliah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H568>Amariah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2396>Hezekiah,<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H526>Amon,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>
I will <S%H622>utterly<s%> sweep <S%H5486>away<s%> everything off of the surface of the <S%H6440>earth,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

I will sweep <S%H5486>away<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>animal.<s%> I will sweep <S%H5486>away<s%> the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> the <S%H1709>fish<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and the <S%H4384>heaps<s%> of rubble with the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%> I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H6440>from<s%> the surface of the <S%H127>earth,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

I will stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> against <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and against all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%> I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H7605>remnant<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal<s%> from this <S%H4725>place:<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3649>idolatrous<s%> and pagan <S%H3548>priests,<s%>

those who <S%H7812>worship<s%> the <S%H6635>army<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky<s%> on the <S%H1406>housetops,<s%> those who <S%H7812>worship<s%> and <S%H7650>swear<s%> by <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> and also <S%H7650>swear<s%> by <S%H4428>Malcam,<s%>
those who have turned <S%H5472>back<s%> <S%H310>from<s%> following <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and those who <S%H1245>haven't<s%> sought <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> nor inquired after <S%H1875>him.<s%>

Be <S%H2013>silent<s%> at the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> for the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is at <S%H7138>hand.<s%> For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H3559>prepared<s%> a <S%H2077>sacrifice.<s%> He has <S%H6942>consecrated<s%> his <S%H7121>guests.<s%>

It will happen in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H2077>sacrifice,<s%> that I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> the <S%H8269>princes,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and all those who are <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H5237>foreign<s%> <S%H4403>clothing.<s%>

In that <S%H3117>day,<s%> I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> all those who <S%H1801>leap<s%> over the <S%H4670>threshold,<s%> who <S%H4390>fill<s%> their <S%H113>master<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> with <S%H2555>violence<s%> and <S%H4820>deceit.<s%>

In that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> there will be the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of a <S%H6818>cry<s%> from the <S%H1709>fish<s%> <S%H8179>gate,<s%> a <S%H3215>wailing<s%> from the <S%H4932>second<s%> <S%H1419>quarter,<s%> and a great <S%H7667>crashing<s%> from the <S%H1389>hills.<s%>

<S%H3213>Wail,<s%> you <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H4389>Maktesh,<s%> for all the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> are <S%H1820>undone!<s%> All those who were <S%H5187>loaded<s%> with <S%H3701>silver<s%> are cut <S%H3772>off.<s%>

It will happen at that <S%H6256>time,<s%> that I will <S%H2664>search<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> with <S%H5216>lamps,<s%> and I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> who are <S%H7087>settled<s%> on their <S%H8105>dregs,<s%> who <S%H559>say<s%> in their <S%H3824>heart,<s%> <S%H3068>"Yahweh<s%> will not do <S%H3190>good,<s%> neither will he do <S%H7489>evil.<s%>"

Their <S%H2428>wealth<s%> will become a <S%H4933>spoil,<s%> and their <S%H1004>houses<s%> a <S%H8077>desolation.<s%> <S%H1129>Yes,<s%> they will build <S%H1004>houses,<s%> but <S%H3427>won't<s%> inhabit <S%H5193>them.<s%> They will plant <S%H3754>vineyards,<s%> but <S%H8354>won't<s%> drink their <S%H3196>wine.<s%>

The <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is <S%H7138>near.<s%> It is <S%H7138>near,<s%> and <S%H4118>hurries<s%> <S%H3966>greatly,<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> The mighty <S%H1368>man<s%> <S%H6873>cries<s%> there <S%H4751>bitterly.<s%>

That <S%H3117>day<s%> is a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H5678>wrath,<s%> a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H4691>distress<s%> and <S%H6869>anguish,<s%> a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble<s%> and <S%H4875>ruin,<s%> a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H2822>darkness<s%> and <S%H653>gloom,<s%> a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6051>clouds<s%> and <S%H6205>blackness,<s%>
a <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> and <S%H8643>alarm,<s%> against the <S%H1219>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and against the <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H6438>battlements.<s%>

I will bring <S%H6887>distress<s%> on <S%H120>men,<s%> that they will <S%H1980>walk<s%> like blind <S%H5787>men,<s%> because they have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and their <S%H1818>blood<s%> will be poured <S%H8210>out<s%> like <S%H6083>dust,<s%> and their <S%H3894>flesh<s%> like <S%H1561>dung.<s%>

Neither their <S%H3701>silver<s%> nor their <S%H2091>gold<s%> will be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> them in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H5678>wrath,<s%> but the whole <S%H776>land<s%> will be <S%H398>devoured<s%> by the <S%H784>fire<s%> of his <S%H7068>jealousy;<s%> for he will <S%H6213>make<s%> an <S%H926>end,<s%> yes, a terrible <S%H3617>end,<s%> of all those who <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>
